skills.title: React JS

skills.title: Java

portfolio.title: Weather Forecasting App
portfolio.description: A responsive React JS app that shows real-time weather updates for any city using the OpenWeather API, including temperature, humidity, wind speed, and conditions.

portfolio.title: Car Rental System
portfolio.description: A java based car rental system that allows users to book cars, manage rentals, and view available vehicles. this project demonstrates my skills in Java programming and object-oriented design.

portfolio.title: MY Portfolio
portfolio.description: This portfolio showcases my skills, projects, and experiences. It is built using React.js and includes sections for my work, skills, and contact information.
